text.0: card gemunde,/þēah þe hē meahte etc. i.e., he thought longingly of his home, if . . . [speculating whether . . ., wishing for a chance to sail]. See the parallel lines, 1138b-40. Cf. Beibl. xxii 373 f. Of course, a somewhat smoother text could be obtained by the insertion of ne before meahte.
